summary:
Silent Hill is a scary video game where you play as Harry Mason, searching for his lost daughter in a creepy town. It's hard to see clearly because of the fog and darkness, which makes the game feel more mysterious. Harry isn't a fighter; he's just an ordinary guy. The game has multiple endings, depending on what you do.

It was the first in a popular series and is known for being really scary and atmospheric. People liked it so much that it inspired a movie and other games.
title: Silent Hill (video game)
